mapper.select: SELECT *,ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{order_address_longitude}*PI()/180-a.member_service_longitude*PI()/180)/2),2) +COS(#{order_address_longitude}*PI()/180)*COS(a.member_service_latitude*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{order_address_latitude}*PI()/180-a.member_service_latitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance FROM member AS a having a.member_type=1 and a.member_state=1 AND distance IS NOT NULL ORDER BY distance asc
select * from refund_work_order where order_is_delete=0 order by order_accept_time desc

SELECT (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (0,7,4,6,12) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (0,7,4,6,12) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS wait_audit, (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (3,5) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (3,5) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS complete_accept, (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (8,9) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (8,9) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS complete, (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (2,11) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (2,11) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS wait_accept, (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (11) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (11) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS complete_over, (CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (1,15) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN order_state IN (1,15) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END )AS exception FROM work_order WHERE order_is_delete=0 AND TO_DAYS(order_update_time)=TO_DAYS(NOW())
AND order_address_district=#{district}
mapper.update:
update service_class
class_update_time=now(),
class_name=#{class_name},
class_state=#{class_state},
class_img=#{class_img},
class_parent_id=#{class_parent_id},
class_sort=#{class_sort},
class_price=#{class_price},
class_desc=#{class_desc},
class_unit=#{class_unit},
where class_id=#{class_id}
mapper.select: select * from service_class where class_is_delete=0 and class_id=#{class_id}

SELECT a.*,(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN "0" ELSE "1" END FROM service_class WHERE class_parent_id=a.class_id AND class_is_delete='0') AS is_end FROM service_class AS a WHERE a.class_parent_id=#{class_parent_id} AND a.class_is_delete='0' AND class_state='1' ORDER BY a.class_sort ASC
select * from refund_work_order where order_is_delete=0 order by order_accept_time desc
mapper.update:
update work_order
order_update_time=now(),
order_member_id=#{order_member_id},
order_name=#{order_name},
order_phone=#{order_phone},
order_address_country=#{order_address_country},
order_address_province=#{order_address_province},
order_address_city=#{order_address_city},
order_address_district=#{order_address_district},
order_address_detail=#{order_address_detail},
order_address_longitude=#{order_address_longitude},
order_address_latitude=#{order_address_latitude},
order_subscribe_content=#{order_subscribe_content},
order_subscribe_note=#{order_subscribe_note},
order_subscribe_img1=#{order_subscribe_img1},
order_subscribe_img2=#{order_subscribe_img2},
order_subscribe_img3=#{order_subscribe_img3},
order_hope_service_time=#{order_hope_service_time},
order_create_time=#{order_create_time},
order_audit_pass_time=#{order_audit_pass_time},
order_state=#{order_state},
order_accept_id=#{order_accept_id},
order_accept_time=#{order_accept_time},
order_cancle_why=#{order_cancle_why},
order_cancle_time=#{order_cancle_time},
order_cancle_pass_time=#{order_cancle_pass_time},
order_reality_content=#{order_reality_content},
order_complete_img1=#{order_complete_img1},
order_complete_img2=#{order_complete_img2},
order_complete_img3=#{order_complete_img3},
order_complete_note=#{order_complete_note},
order_service_time=#{order_service_time},
order_complete_time=#{order_complete_time},
order_complete_pass_time=#{order_complete_pass_time},
order_is_delete=#{order_is_delete},
order_class_id=#{order_class_id},
order_price=#{order_price},
work_requirements=#{work_requirements},
order_final_price=#{order_final_price},
is_lock=#{is_lock},
lock_id=#{lock_id},
work_way=#{work_way},
where order_id=#{order_id}
update work_order set order_is_delete=1 where FIND_IN_SET(order_id,#{ids})
